statements: SELECT * FROM financial_market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM financial_market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, volume, high_price FROM financial_market_data WHERE volume > 1000000 ORDER BY high_price DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM financial_market_data WHERE open_price < 100 AND close_price > 120;
SELECT symbol, date, low_price FROM financial_market_data WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM financial_market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM financial_market_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close FROM financial_market_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING AVG(close_price) > 100 ORDER BY avg_close DESC;
SELECT symbol, date, high_price, low_price, (high_price - low_price) AS price_range FROM financial_market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM financial_market_data WHERE close_price > open_price AND volume > 50000 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price > 100
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data ORDER BY symbol DESC
SELECT symbol, volume FROM market_data WHERE volume >= 500 ORDER BY volume ASC
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price FROM market_data
SELECT analyst_id, name FROM analysts WHERE position = 'Senior Analyst'
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT symbol, volume FROM market_data WHERE price < 50;
SELECT name, position FROM analysts WHERE position = 'Senior Analyst';
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 5000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM financial_market_data;
SELECT symbol, price FROM financial_market_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT symbol, volume, timestamp FROM financial_market_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, country FROM market_participants WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT symbol, trend, recommendation FROM market_analysis WHERE trend = 'bullish';
SELECT * FROM financial_market_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price FROM financial_market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, industry FROM financial_market_data JOIN market_participants ON financial_market_data.symbol = market_participants.name WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT symbol, trend, recommendation FROM financial_market_data JOIN market_analysis ON financial_market_data.symbol = market_analysis.symbol WHERE recommendation = 'Buy' ORDER BY trend DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT symbol, volume FROM financial_market_data WHERE symbol LIKE 'AAPL%' AND volume > 10000;
SELECT * FROM financial_market_data LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, close, volume FROM financial_market_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT symbol, high, low, close FROM financial_market_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT symbol, date, open, close FROM financial_market_data WHERE symbol='AAPL'
SELECT symbol, date, volume FROM financial_market_data WHERE volume > 100000
SELECT symbol, date, close FROM financial_market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT analysis_id, symbol, analysis_date, sentiment_score FROM market_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT decision_id, symbol, decision_date, decision_type FROM market_decisions WHERE decision_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT metric_id, symbol, metric_date, metric_type, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_type = 'Revenue' ORDER BY metric_value DESC, metric_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics JOIN market_analysis ON performance_metrics.symbol = market_analysis.symbol WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01' AND sentiment_score > 0.8 ORDER BY metric_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Securities;
SELECT company_name, price FROM Securities ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM Securities WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM StockPrices WHERE date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT headline, content FROM MarketNews ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, company_name, price, volume FROM Securities WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT date, symbol, open_price, close_price FROM StockPrices ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, name, account_balance FROM Traders WHERE account_balance < 10000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC
SELECT transaction_id, date, trader_id, symbol, price, quantity FROM Transactions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT news_id, date, headline, content FROM MarketNews WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
